Name: Warrior
Description:
Only ever knowing violence, the warrior's purpose is to protect people from ever experiencing that pain themselves.
Unmatched with blades and axes, the warrior likes to get up close and personal during combat. They rely on their
strength above all else to solve their problems.

StartingWeapons.Name: Shortsword
StartingWeapons.Description: Double edged blade, cross-guard, grip, and pommel. Typically 30-50 cm in length with a sharp point.

StartingAbilities.Name: Intimidate
StartingAbilities.Description: Uses your overwhelming presence to make someone fearful and bend to your will.

Command.Description: Attempt to make your target fearful
Attempts to leap to a location or on top of a target

Name: Ranger
Description:
Born of the forest, a ranger is one with their surroundings. Heightened senses allow the ranger to detect changes in
their environment that others may not realize. The ranger excels with a bow. The ranger's soft footsteps developed over
years of hunting and tracking are a great tool for getting into places undetected.

StartingWeapons.Name: Shortbow
StartingWeapons.Description: Simple bow, often used for hunting.

StartingAmmunition.Name: Wooden Arrow
StartingAmmunition.Description: Simple arrow made from any type of wood.

StartingAbilities.Name: Sneak
StartingAbilities.Description: Uses your overwhelming presence to make someone fearful and bend to your will.

Command.Description: Attempts to sneak. Attacking or using an item makes you stop sneaking.

StartingAbilities.Name: Observe
StartingAbilities.Description: Observes your surroundings for any hints or clues that normally may not be seen.

Command.Description: Studying the target more closely than normal.

Name: Mage
Description:
The mage is born with a connection to the Elemental Plane. Years of study and patience has resulted in an understanding
of the magical world that others can't even begin to realize. Typically, the mage prefers non-physical means of solving
problems, and with their high intelligence and their knowledge of the magical arts, there are few problems that a mage
cannot solve.

StartingWeapons.Name: Quarterstaff
StartingWeapons.Description: Simple wooden staff, often used for walking.

StartingSpells.Name: Ember Throw
StartingSpells.Description: Summons small embers then propels them at the target.

StartingAbilities.Name: Levitate
StartingAbilities.Description: Magical energies lift you off the ground. Can levitate up to 30 ft high.

Command.Description: Begins to levitate. If you attack or use a spell, you stop levitating.

StartingAbilities.Name: Old Sight
StartingAbilities.Description: Observes your surroundings as seen in a glimpse of the past.

Command.Description: Sees a glimpse of your current surroundings from the past.
